Actions.Name: Add a subscription to a folder
Actions.Description: Add a subscription to a specific folder.

Actions.Description: Delete a tag from the account.

Actions.Description: Edit the information for a specific subscription.

Actions.Description: Get the number of unread items across all streams.

Actions.Description: Get the number of unread items for a specific stream.

Actions.Description: Triggers when a new subscription is added to your account.

Actions.Name: When unread count reaches a target
Actions.Description: Triggers when the number of unread items for a subscription reaches or exceeds the target value.

Actions.Description: Remove a subscription from a specific folder.

Actions.Name: Stream contents
Actions.Description: Lists the articles for a given collection.
